name: MOSAIC Now - Puzzle by Number
description:
Go low poly! Solve a puzzle, relax and sharpen your brain with the viral puzzle-by-number polygon game. Download it NOW! Be trendy with MOSAIC Now and immerse in an absolutely different jigsaw fun ― surprising, colorful and inspiring!

WHAT U GET
Explore a great collection of crystal patterns, organized in themed categories ― Animals, Fantasy, Lifestyle, People, Sports, etc. With minimalistic and clean design, the app brings the filling of purity and inner comfort. It’s intuitive yet exciting.

HOW TO PLAY
Play it like a jigsaw puzzle. Tap and drag elements to correct areas to assemble fantastic artworks step by step. Want a hint? Zoom in a certain piece of a pic and see the advised parts automatically adjust to the piece you’re playing. Track your progress in every category with a percentage line. It appears right after you finish the first picture.

ACHIEVEMENTS
Explore the exclusive yet encouraging feature “Achievements”. Check the list of the goals to accomplish. Get bonus points for those completed. Collect as many points as you can.

RELAX IN LOW POLY
Meet the new generation of relaxation. Start a new page or keep assembling the unfinished one. Whenever you feel stressed out or bored, just open the app to get your relaxing session. Keep calm and low poly the stress away.

PERFECT FOR ALL AGES
Discover a great game for the whole family. Teach your kids basic number recognition and help them develop a sense of beauty. Enhance your own understanding of futuristic designs and increase imagination. Spread the word to parents to customize their jigsaw playing skills and find them spending hours with their new hobby.

TRAIN YOUR BRAIN
Dealing with geometric shapes has never been so much fun. Choose the number of pieces right for you to play easy or hard. Sort pieces by colors, sizes, and numbers to find your way of playing. Enhance concentration and exercise your mind.

CHALLENGE YOURSELF
Too easy? Turn off the by-number mode to boost your imagination and take your strategic vision to the next level. That’s an absolute brain-training beast!

SHARE YOUR ARTWORK
Once you’ve completed the pic, it’s saved to a gallery. You can always look through all your finished works. Wanna share the beauty with friends and family? You’re just a tap away from letting them know.

Forget the routine. Have fun with new-gen low poly puzzles. Get the app and start your low poly adventure today. Let’s play!
